Description: Blue glazed composition reis shabti with painted detail: a wig with short curled lappets tied with a black fillet, a modelled face with black eyes, one arm is held in relief against the chest and holds a black whip; figure wears a garment with elbow length sleeves and a triangular apron, the back is decorated with a representation of a black seed-basket, the feet are separated and rest on a plinth with the toes delineated.
